mapper.sql: CSY110, CSY100, CSY111, CSY112, CSY113, CSY114, CSY115, CSY116
mapper.select: select sy11.csy110 as csy110, sy11.csy111 as csy111, sy11.csy112 as csy112, sy11.csy113 as csy113, sy11.csy114 as csy114, sy11.csy115 as csy115, sy11.csy116 as csy116, sy10.csy101 as csy101 from sy11 sy11, sy10 sy10 where sy11.csy100 = sy10.csy100 and sy10.csy100 = #{csy100} and sy10.csy102 = 0 and sy11.csy116 = 0
mapper.insert: insert into sy11 (CSY100, CSY111, CSY112, CSY113, CSY114, CSY115, CSY116) values (#{csy100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy111,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy112,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy113,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy114,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{csy115,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy116,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select csy100, csy110, csy111, csy112, csy113, csy114, csy115, csy116 from sy11 where csy110 = #{csy110}
mapper.update: update sy11 set csy100 = #{csy100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csy111 = #{csy111,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csy112 = #{csy112,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csy113 = #{csy113,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csy114 = #{csy114,jdbcType=TINYINT}, csy115 = #{csy115,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csy116 = #{csy116,jdbcType=TINYINT} where csy110 = #{csy110,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(sy11.csy110) as value, sy10.csy101 as name, sy10.csy100 as id from sy11 sy11, sy10 sy10 where sy11.csy100 = sy10.csy100 and sy11.csy116 = 0 and sy10.csy102 = 0 group by sy10.csy101
SELECT sy10.CSY101, sy11.CSY110, sy11.CSY111, sy11.CSY112, sy11.CSY113, sy11.CSY114, sy11.CSY115 FROM sy10 sy10, sy11 sy11 where sy10.CSY100=sy11.CSY100 and sy10.CSY102=0 AND sy11.CSY116=0
SELECT sy10.CSY101, sy11.CSY110, sy11.CSY111, sy11.CSY112, sy11.CSY113, sy11.CSY114, sy11.CSY115 FROM sy10 sy10, sy11 sy11 where sy10.CSY100=sy11.CSY100 and sy11.CSY110 = #{csy110}
mapper.insert: insert into sy11 (CSY110, CSY100, CSY111, CSY112, CSY113, CSY114, CSY115, CSY116) values (#{csy110,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csy100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy111,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy112,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy113,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy114,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{csy115,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy116,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into sy11

mapper.update:
update sy11
CSY100 = #{csy100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY111 = #{csy111,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY112 = #{csy112,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY113 = #{csy113,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY114 = #{csy114,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CSY115 = #{csy115,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY116 = #{csy116,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where CSY110 = #{csy110,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sy11 set CSY100 = #{csy100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSY111 = #{csy111,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSY112 = #{csy112,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSY113 = #{csy113,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSY114 = #{csy114,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CSY115 = #{csy115,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSY116 = #{csy116,jdbcType=TINYINT} where CSY110 = #{csy110,jdbcType=INTEGER}
